ABOUT_ME.INFO_PARAGRAPH: Hello, I'm Abbas. I've always been passionate about IT and have helped those around me with their PC-related issues. After several years without my own computer, I purchased one and began programming mods and games with friends. I enjoyed it so much that I decided to pursue it as a career. What I appreciate most about programming is the constant opportunity to learn and the challenges that come with finding and fixing errors. The feeling of having accomplished something motivates me to keep going. Let's work together to create something extraordinary!

SKILLS.INFO_PARAGRAPH: I have extensive experience with front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as frameworks like Angular and React. I am always open to learning new things and strive to continuously improve my skills to create user-friendly and engaging interfaces.

PROJECTS.INFO_PARAGRAPH: I encourage you to check out my projects and interact with them! When creating responsive and user-friendly applications, I focus on efficient code. My goal is to combine intuitive design with optimal performance, ensuring users have a smooth experience. Feel free to explore my work and share your feedback!

COLLEAGUES.QUOTE_1: Working alongside Abbas El Mahmoud has been a fantastic experience. Their attention to detail and commitment to quality consistently elevate our projects. They have an impressive ability to transform complex ideas into user-friendly designs.
COLLEAGUES.QUOTE_2: Abbas El Mahmoud is not only a skilled frontend developer but also a great team player. They bring creativity and enthusiasm to every challenge, making collaboration enjoyable and productive. Their coding skills are matched only by their willingness to help others grow.
COLLEAGUES.QUOTE_3: I’ve had the pleasure of collaborating with Abbas El Mahmoud on several projects. Their innovative approach and technical expertise have been invaluable. They always stay updated with the latest trends, ensuring our work remains cutting-edge and effective.

CONTACT.INFO_PARAGRAPH: I warmly invite you to reach out to me! I am particularly interested in roles that allow me to apply my front-end skills to innovative projects. With my expertise and passion for continuous learning, I am confident that I can make a valuable contribution. I bring not only technical knowledge but also creativity and teamwork. Let’s collaborate on exciting challenges and achieve extraordinary results together!
CONTACT.PLACEHOLDER_MESSAGE: Hello Lukas, I am interested in...
CONTACT.PRIVACY_POLICY: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
CONTACT.TEXT_VALIDATION_SECOND: Message must contain at least 10 characters.
CONTACT.NAME_VALIDATION_SECOND: Name must contain at least 3 characters.
CONTACT.EMAIL_VALIDATION_SECOND: Email must contain at least 3 characters.
CONTACT.NAME_VALIDATION_THIRD: The name must not contain numbers or special characters!
CONTACT.MAIL_SEND: Your message has been successfully sent.

JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks drag and drop functions, assign users and categories
JOIN.IMPLEMENTDETAILS: In the 'Join' project, I developed a platform that enhances collaboration and communication among users. I used JavaScript and Node.js, and worked with the Firebase API to store inputs and ensure a reliable database. Additionally, I implemented user login and registration features to enhance the platforms security. Through close collaboration in an agile team, we were able to adapt the platform flexibly and continuously improve it.

ELPOLLOLOCO.DESCRIPTION: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
ELPOLLOLOCO.IMPLEMENTDETAILS: In the 'El Pollo Loco' project, I developed an engaging jump-and-run game based on object-oriented programming. Players take on the role of Pepe, navigating through various levels to collect coins and Tabasco salsa while battling crazy chickens. I used JavaScript to implement the game mechanics, focusing on an object-oriented design to create characters and their interactions. The game features interactive gameplay elements, challenging boss fights, and lively sound effects that enhance the overall experience. Through close collaboration with other developers, I was able to continuously improve and adapt the game.

DABUBBLE.DESCRIPTION: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.
DABUBBLE.IMPLEMENTDETAILS: In the 'Join' project, I developed a platform that enhances collaboration and communication among users. I used JavaScript and Node.js, and worked with the Firebase API to store inputs and ensure a reliable database. Additionally, I implemented user login and registration features to enhance the platforms security. Through close collaboration in an agile team, we were able to adapt the platform flexibly and continuously improve it.
